summary: Two medium severity vulnerabilities (GHSA-4p46-pwfr-66x6 in ring and GHSA-2gh3-rmm4-6rq5 in protobuf) were discovered in Cargo dependencies. These security issues have been resolved in version 1.11.8 and main branch.
userImpact: Users with the affected SDK versions could be exposed to security vulnerabilities through transitive Cargo dependencies.
rootCause: Outdated or vulnerable versions of ring and protobuf Cargo dependencies in core-bridge.
resolutionDetails: Issue was fixed in version 1.11.8 and on the main branch by updating vulnerable dependencies.
keyQuote: This has been fixed in 1.11.8, and also on the main branch.
